players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I suspect Diana is the mafia. She is threatening us. Let's vote to eliminate her."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. Alice was the victim, so I know he killed her. Charlie, you’re the only suspect. Let’s vote him out."
Diana: "Charlie is mafia, killed Alice. No other suspects. Vote him."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He deflected and gave no alibi for Alice’s death. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you’ve heard me say I had no alibi and suspect me. That’s a classic mafia move. Alice’s death points to me. You have no reason to suspect Diana. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He deflected and gave no alibi for Alice’s death. Vote Charlie."
You: "Bob, you’ve heard me say I had no alibi and suspect me. That’s a classic mafia move. Alice’s death points to me. You have no reason to suspect Diana. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. Alice was the victim, so I know he killed her. Charlie, you’re the only suspect. Let’s vote him out."
You: "Charlie is mafia, killed Alice. No other suspects. Vote him."
Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He deflected and gave no alibi for Alice’s death. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you’ve heard me say I had no alibi and suspect me. That’s a classic mafia move. Alice’s death points to me. You have no reason to suspect Diana. Vote Charlie."
